title: A very simple question...
body:
What do you call this meta?

Every meta has been easily named, bruiser meta, tank meta, mobility meta, etc... what the hell do you call the meta we are in now without people  revolting against your claim?

I think it is the thunderlord meta :^)

if I had to label it for real, it is kinda like an early game ADC meta a mid game AP meta and a late game tank bruiser meta.... but even then 90% of people reading that will make a post as to why I'm an idiot. 

If I am stupid, then you do better...

How about the "not assassin" meta.
